name: Ethereal Blade
description: A flickering blade of a ghastly nature, it is capable of dealing damage in both magical and physical planes.

abilities.name: Ether Blast
abilities.description: Blasts the target with an projectile that turns them ethereal, rendering them immune to physical damage and not attackable, but more vulnerable to magical damage, as well as disarming them.
notes: Turns the target ethereal, disarming them and granting 100% physical damage resistance
Magic resistance reduction does not stack with other ethereal sources
Reduces most heroes' magic resistance to -5%
Can be used on allies or enemies
For primary attribute heroes: 50 + 1.5 × CurrentPrimaryAttribute damage
For universal heroes: 50 + 0.45 × Sum of all attributes damage

additionalInfo: The item's attributes grant additional health, mana, attack speed, armor, and attack damage
Excellent for intelligence heroes and spellcasters
Can be used defensively on self to avoid physical damage
Works well in combination with Dagon for burst damage
Disrupts enemies who rely on right-click attacks
Provides spell lifesteal amplification and mana regeneration amplification
